title: City Building Series
description:
Some of the greatest city building simulations of all time since SimCity, the City Building Series brings city building simulations a whole new flavour by introducing different historical themes as well as concepts such as religion and war (neither present in SimCity).

This compilation includes:

1. Ancient Rome series
- Caesar*
- Caesar II*
- Caesar III
- Caesar IV

2. Ancient Egypt series
- Pharaoh
- Cleopatra: Queen of the Nile expansion pack
- Immortal Cities: Children of the Nile -- Enhanced Edition & Alexandria expansion pack

3. Ancient China series
- Emperor: Rise of the Middle Kingdom

4. Ancient Greek series
- Zeus: Master of Olympus
- Poseidon: Master of Atlantis expansion pack

Installation:
1. Mount images
2. Install
3. Crack (if needed)
4. Play

*Note: these are not compatible with modern operating systems as such you may need to use an emulator.

Language: English
